channel.title: Human Tracking on Yu Zhou
channel.description: Recent content in Human Tracking on Yu Zhou

item.title: Dog-Drone
item.description: From March to June 2018, I worked on the proof-of-concept phase of the “Dog-Drone” project. The objective is to immobilize suspicious individuals in an indoor environment by flying multiple drones aggressively around them. My work includes the following: Human detection and tracking Trajectory generation System integration This work has resulted in papers published in the IEEE ICCA and IECON 2018. Video 1. Dog-Drone demo At this stage, to prove the concept, we are using the off-the-shelf flight platform with a visual odometry integration.
